error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication, check your API key

user.description:
Configure the YR Norwegian Water Temperatures integration.

Get your API key from https://badetemperaturer.yr.no

You can monitor all locations or specify particular ones. If monitoring all locations, automatic cleanup is recommended to prevent accumulating hundreds of inactive sensors.

data.locations: Specific locations to monitor (comma-separated names or IDs)
data.enable_cleanup: Enable automatic cleanup of inactive sensors

reconfigure.description:
Update your YR Norwegian Water Temperatures configuration.

Modify your API key and other settings as needed.

data.locations: Specific locations to monitor (comma-separated names or IDs)
data.enable_cleanup: Enable automatic cleanup of inactive sensors
